SEARCH
Package com.Highspring.ShoppingCart.service

Class OrderItemService

java.lang.Object
com.Highspring.ShoppingCart.service.OrderItemService
@Service public class OrderItemService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing OrderItem operations such as adding items to an order, clearing items, and checking out an order.

This class acts as an intermediary between the controller and the repository layers, enforcing business rules and validation before persisting or transforming data.

    OrderItem
    addOrderItem(Long itemIdAddedToOrder, Long quantity)
    Adds an Order Item to an OrderItem list and returns the latest added OrderItem
    Order
    checkOutItems()
    Passes the OrderItem list and Subtotal (sum of all the prices from all the items inside the OrderItem List) to Order service to perform the checkout with the current Order Item List
    void
    clearItemOrders()
    Clears the OrderItem list (orderItems) from all its elements and updates subTotal to 0.0

    Returns in memory orderItem list.

  • Method Details

    • findAllOrderItem

      public List<OrderItem> findAllOrderItem()
      Returns in memory orderItem list. This is an in memory that saves the added shopping cart Order items
      Returns:
      a list of OrderItem

    • addOrderItem

      public OrderItem addOrderItem(Long itemIdAddedToOrder, Long quantity)
      Adds an Order Item to an OrderItem list and returns the latest added OrderItem
      Parameters:
      itemIdAddedToOrder - identification number (Long) for the Item to be used for the OrderItem object to be added to the list
      quantity - amount of Item related to an OrderItem
      Returns:
      a OrderItem of the OrderItem currently added to the in memory list

    • checkOutItems

      public Order checkOutItems()
      Passes the OrderItem list and Subtotal (sum of all the prices from all the items inside the OrderItem List) to Order service to perform the checkout with the current Order Item List
      Returns:
      the Order created by the OrderService from the OrderItem list

    • clearItemOrders

      public void clearItemOrders()
      Clears the OrderItem list (orderItems) from all its elements and updates subTotal to 0.0
